Question
========

In a class there are 30 students, three of whom are left-handed. Suppose that the teacher simultaneously randomly chooses two students. What is the probability that two left-handed students will be chosen?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/30
* 2/30
* 1/145
* 2/100
* 2/3

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/30: Incorrect
* 2/30: Incorrect
* 1/145: Correct
* 2/100: Incorrect
* 2/3: Incorrect
